fullText: Bradley Cooper brings both the necessary star power and the requisite acting chops to make John Merrick's story sing with surprising beauty and uncompromising honesty.
dtliExcerpt: Bradley Cooper brings both the necessary star power and the requisite acting chops to make John Merrick's story sing with surprising beauty and uncompromising honesty.
